name: investie
description: Comprehensive investment assistant application with mobile (React Native/Expo) and web (Next.js 14) frontends, powered by a NestJS backend

scripts.build:packages: npm run build:types && npm run build:utils
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:web && npm run build:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:packages && npm run typecheck:apps
scripts.typecheck:packages: cd packages/types && npm run typecheck && cd ../utils && npm run typecheck
scripts.typecheck:apps: cd apps/web && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: cd packages/types && npm test && cd ../mock && npm test && cd ../utils && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:apps
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/types && npm install && cd ../mock && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/mobile && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: Investie Team
